examples: Both of them are talented musicians.

suggested: Why did the math book look so sad? It had too many problems, and it couldn't solve them both!
Sometimes, the word 'both' can remind us of situations where we have to make difficult choices or feel torn between two options.
Why do some people try to force others into an 'either-or' situation instead of recognizing that both options can coexist? It's so frustrating!
Did you know that the word 'both' emphasizes inclusivity, acknowledging the presence or involvement of two or more entities?
There's no specific smell associated with the word 'both', but it can evoke memories of situations where different scents coexist or blend together.
The experience of holding or touching two separate objects or entities at the same time, feeling their individual characteristics or textures.
The concept of 'both' can symbolize inclusivity, balance, and finding common ground by acknowledging and embracing multiple perspectives or options.
